content.question: Which of the following is true about the national debt of the United States?

choices.label: It is the debt owed to foreign investors.
It is the accumulation of past and current budget deficits and surpluses.
It increases when gross domestic product increases.
It increases when exports decrease, and decreases when exports increase.

content.answer: It is the accumulation of past and current budget deficits and surpluses.

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt
